text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's the day before tryouts, and I'm<n>taking an afternoon
stroll in a nearby<n>park, when suddenly...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Wh-whoooa! Move! Move!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hup!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Whoosh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing I was unable to react to her in<n>time, Tokai Teio leaps
clean over my<n>head. Moments later...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Whew! ...Here, your hat!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Apparently, this little girl's hat had<n>gotten stuck in a tree,
and Teio's<n>fetched it for her.

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Thanks so much, miss! That<n>jump was super high!
You looked so<n>cool!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Tsk tsk, don't you know my name?<n>I'm the incredible, the
invincible Teio!<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text:
In...vincible? I don't know what that<n>means, but it sounds
cool!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hehehe! You may shower me with all<n>the praise you want!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh, almost forgot. You there! Sorry for<n>the scare.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
No brakes on these legs—ended up<n>flying right over you! Oh,
you're not<n>hurt or anything, are you?
choice_data_list: I should be asking you, that's quite some air you got. Are your legs fine from the landing?
I should be asking you, that's quite some air you got. Are your legs fine from the landing?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hah! It'll take more than that to hurt<n>me! See? Not a scratch!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That was no short fall, but she really<n>does seem to be just
fine.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's tough, and agile too, if that<n>jump is anything to go
by—a natural<n>athlete's physique.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Did I scare you? I totally did, didn't I?<n>Hehe. ♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Oh, shoot! Almost forgot I was in the<n>middle of a run. See ya
later!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And with that, Tokai Teio runs off, her<n>steps light as a
breeze—another<n>testament to her talent.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I watch from the sidelines at<n>tryouts the following day,
she's still at<n>the top of my mind.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: That's it, Teio! Keep it up!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And coming up from behind is Tokai<n>Teio, gunning for the
lead with a spring<n>in her step!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hehe. First place is mine!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Tokai Teio pulling farther and farther<n>ahead! She's not
slowing down,<n>she's leaving everyone else in the<n>dust!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And across the line with four lengths<n>over second place!
Today's tryout<n>triumph goes to Tokai Teio! What an<n>
overwhelming display of strength!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Phew! Heeey! What'd you all think of<n>my race?

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: You were the best, Teio!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: You were so cool!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Heh, thank youuu! But, just another<n>day for me!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Huh? You... Ah! You were the one at<n>the park yesterday!
Wait, but what are<n>you doing here?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I get it! You're a trainer! You've<n>even got the badge and
everything!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
So if you're talking to me... does that<n>mean you're here to
scout me?
choice_data_list: I'd love to be your trainer!
I'd love to be your trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ehehe. Ohhh, I don't know... See, I'vebeen approached by a lot oftrainers, even before tryouts.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Ah! There you are, Tokai Teio! Yourperformance was simply incredible!You have to let me scout you!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Teio, let's work together! With me,<n>you won't just be a G1
champion,<n>you'll be a Triple Crown Champion!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Wh-whoa, and now there's more!<n>Nnngh, so many trainers
want me, it's<n>impossible to choose!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
But, well, since I'll be the one doing<n>the actual running,
maybe it doesn't<n>even matter who my trainer is.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Okay, whoever beats me in rock<n>paper scissors gets to
scout me!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Come now, Teio—the bond between<n>trainer and runner
should not be taken<n>so lightly.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ahh, it's Prez! Prez is here!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
You came to watch my tryouts! Well?<n>Well? What did you
think?! I came first<n>again!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes, yes, I saw with my own two<n>eyes. You ran an excellent
race, as<n>always.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Woohoo! Hehe. A compliment from<n>Prez! ♪ Hey hey, did you
all hear that?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Y-yes, but never mind that<n>now—I'm here to talk about
scouting.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: "Never mind"?! What do you mean,"never mind"? Do you have anyidea how great Prez is?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: She's not just the student councilpresident, she's the fastest andstrongest and coolest racer ever, and she's also my biggest rolemodel!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
One day, I'm gonna be just like her,<n>then she'll be giving
me compliments<n>all day long!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Sooo, if you're serious about<n>scouting me, then first you'd
better<n>learn all about how great she is!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Starting with, let's see... Have you<n>seen her debut race? No
way you<n>haven't, right? Oh my gosh, the way<n>she
rounded that first corner!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Teio proceeds to regale the hopeful<n>trainers with tales of her
beloved<n>student council president's heroics.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Needless to say, there was no time to<n>talk about scouting.
